title: FSB Warns of 'Cascading Failures' Due to Crypto Regulatory Arbitrage
contentSnippet: The Financial Stability Board says fragmented rules enable crypto firms to shop around for lenient jurisdictions, threatening market stability.

title: BNB is Now Down 11% From Its Record High Despite Coinbase Roadmap Listing
contentSnippet: The token's recent addition to Coinbase's listing roadmap has failed to boost its price, but corporate treasury accumulation continues.

title: Bitcoin Treasury Firms Aren’t Soaking Up BTC Supply AnyMore
contentSnippet: The slowdown in DAT demand could be a factor in the stall in bitcoin's bull run.

title: Kraken Acquires U.S.-Licensed Derivatives Platform From IG for $100M
contentSnippet: Kraken bought Small Exchange for $32.5 million in cash and $67.5 million in stock, IG announced on Thursday

title: 170-year-old bank now holds OKX institutional clients’ crypto in Europe
contentSnippet: October’s crypto crash has reignited the “Wild West” narrative, but OKX and Standard Chartered are here to prove it’s not the case, OKX Europe’s Erald Ghoos said.

title: WazirX Set to Restart Within 10 Days, Victims to Receive Crypto and ‘Recovery Tokens’
contentSnippet: With the ACRA submission complete, the exchange enters the implementation phase, or a period during which users will receive distributions and Recovery Tokens (RTs) under the scheme.

title: Bitcoin Traders Eye 113K–115k, While Alts Get Decimated Again: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 16, 2025

title: Memecoins rewind to July levels as markets struggle to recover
contentSnippet: The memecoin market lost almost 40% in a day before slightly rebounding, as top tokens like DOGE and SHIB remained deep in the red.

title: Visa Says It Wants to Build the Rails for Lending in ‘Onchain Finance,’ Its New Name for DeFi
contentSnippet: The payments giant’s latest report rebrands decentralized finance as “onchain finance” and positions Visa as the data and custody layer connecting banks to a $670B stablecoin credit market.

title: Bitcoin retail interest is in ‘bear market’ as crypto sentiment flips to fear
contentSnippet: Despite recent all-time highs and volatility, search interest for “Bitcoin” on Google remained low as the crypto sentiment index returned to “fear.”

title: Kraken Buys Small Exchange for $100M Ahead of US Derivatives Trading Launch
contentSnippet: The purchase gives Kraken the right to offer regulated derivatives trading in the US, though no launch timeline was mentioned.

title: Trump’s second term fuels a $1B crypto fortune for his family: Report
contentSnippet: The Trump family’s crypto ventures have generated over $1 billion in profit, led by World Liberty Financial and memecoins including TRUMP and MELANIA.

title: Bitfarms Launches $300M Convertible Note Offering, Shares Drop Pre-Market
contentSnippet: Bitfarms share price has soared over 315% year to date, due to AI/HPC pivot.

title: Is BNB Bull Run Due For Correction Amid Community Backlash?
contentSnippet: Analysts say BNB faces short-term pressure from derivatives data and community backlash, though the long-term trend remains intact.

title: From coffee shops to airlines: Who accepts Bitcoin, Ether and XRP in 2025
contentSnippet: Everyday shopping, travel and luxury purchases are going digital. Here’s where BTC, ETH and XRP are accepted in 2025.

title: SEC chair: US is 10 years behind on crypto, fixing this is ‘job one’
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Paul Atkins said the US is a decade behind on crypto and that building a regulatory framework to attract innovation is “job one” for the agency.

title: Kraken doubles down on US futures with $100M ‘Small’ acquisition
contentSnippet: After acquiring NinjaTrader for $1.5 billion, Kraken expands its derivatives offerings in the US with a $100 million acquisition of Small Exchange.

title: Australia's Government Proposes New Powers for AUSTRAC to Restrict Crypto ATMs
contentSnippet: AUSTRAC said that the majority of high-value crypto ATM transactions were directly associated with scams or moving money to high-risk jurisdictions.

title: Bitcoin Faces Heavy Selling Pressure Despite Seasonal Bullish Expectations
contentSnippet: Long-term holders and whales continue to offload BTC as profit-taking intensifies and the four-year cycle narrative shows signs of weakening.

title: Strive’s crypto merger with Semler Scientific faces shareholder revolt
contentSnippet: Shareholder Terry Tran filed a lawsuit against Semler Scientific and its board, accusing them of misleading shareholders about the financial fairness of their merger with Strive.

title: France’s Lise Wins License to Launch Europe’s First Tokenized Stock Exchange
contentSnippet: The Paris-based exchange has secured a distributed ledger technology license from French regulator ACPR.

title: Paxos、PYUSD300兆ドル誤発行で緊急対応　セキュリティ被害はなし
contentSnippet: PayPalステーブルコインPYUSDの発行元Paxosが300兆ドルを誤発行後、約20分で全量焼却した。内部技術エラーが原因で、セキュリティ侵害や顧客資金への影響はないと発表。

title: What happens if Ether reaches $100,000?
contentSnippet: ETH at $100,000 could mean a $12-trillion market cap. Explore ETF inflows, L2 scaling, staking dynamics and Ethereum’s resilience.

title: エリック・トランプが不動産トークン化プロジェクトを発表　1000ドルから取得可能に
contentSnippet: エリック・トランプ氏が不動産のトークン化プロジェクトを発表した。WLFIとUSD1を活用し、少額から不動産の部分所有が可能に。従来の高額投資や低い流動性といった課題を解決し、不動産投資の民主化を目指す。

title: Square Enables First Bitcoin Payment at US Coffee Chain
contentSnippet: All 10 wallet tests succeeded at the coffee shop instantly as Square prepares worldwide rollout of its new Bitcoin payment system.

title: Bitcoin needs a fresh catalyst to avoid a ‘deeper correction’ — Analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin will need something new and shiny to drive it to fresh highs, as some analysts warn the asset could face a volatile month ahead.

title: Australia’s Home Affairs Minister Announces Sweeping Powers to Curb Crypto ATMs
contentSnippet: The minister's comments follow AUSTRAC findings that some high-value crypto ATM activity involved fraud and laundering schemes.

title: Bitcoin's $19 Billion Leverage Wipeout Leaves Market in Reset Mode
contentSnippet: Analysts say Bitcoin is in a "bottom-forming phase," with a recovery riding on macro improvements and institutional flows.

title: ビットコイン市場はリセット局面　市場回復の鍵は？＝Glassnode週間レポート
contentSnippet: Glassnodeが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の最新レポートを発表。米国の関税懸念で190億ドル規模のレバレッジ解消後、ETFや先物など市場動向と今後を分析している。

title: 様子見基調のビットコイン、市場は緊迫化する米中貿易摩擦の行方を注視
contentSnippet: ビットコインは111,500ドルで推移。トランプ関税ショックで100億ドル超のレバレッジが解消され、デリバティブ市場がリセット。重要な価格レンジ内で市場の方向性が注目される局面に。米中貿易摩擦の行方が焦点。

title: CMEグループ、SOLおよびXRP先物オプションの取引開始を発表　機関投資家向けヘッジ手段が拡大
contentSnippet: 世界最大級のデリバティブ取引所を運営するCMEグループは14日、ソラナとXRP先物オプションの初取引を発表した。XRP先物オプションの初取引は10月12日にWintermuteとSuperstateの間で、ソラナ先物オプションの初取引は13日にCumberland DRWとGalaxyの間で執行された。

title: ソニー銀行、米国で国家銀行免許を申請　米ドルステーブルコイン発行などを計画＝報道
contentSnippet: ソニー銀行は、米国で国家銀行免許を取得するために申請書を提出。子会社が仮想通貨を含む事業を計画しており、米ドルステーブルコインの発行、カストディサービス、デジタル資産運用サービスなどを行うという。

title: BNBチェーン、中国招商銀行の5,700億円規模MMFをトークン化
contentSnippet: BNBチェーンが中国招商銀行CMBによる38億ドル規模のマネーマーケットファンドをオンチェーン化する。CMBMINTとCMBIMINTトークンでDeFi運用も可能になる。

title: 「仮想通貨市場へのトランプ関税ショックの影響は一時的」Bitwiseが3つの判断基準を公開
contentSnippet: Bitwiseの最高投資責任者は、米中対立激化への懸念から起きたビットコインなどの仮想通貨市場の急落は一時的なもので、大きな影響はないとの見方を示した。3つの判断基準を説明している。

title: Dota 2 YouTube Account Briefly Hacked to Promote Solana Meme Coin
contentSnippet: Hackers briefly seized Dota 2’s YouTube channel to push a Solana meme coin in a coordinated pump-and-dump.

title: Google Unveils Veo 3.1 to Rival OpenAI's Sora 2—But Does It Deliver?
contentSnippet: The upgraded AI video generator adds sound and precision editing tools as Google intensifies its challenge to OpenAI’s Sora 2.

title: North Korean Hackers Target Crypto Devs Through Open-Source Software Hub
contentSnippet: Researchers say hundreds of booby-trapped code packages on a major programming platform were part of a state-backed campaign to steal crypto and infiltrate tech firms.

title: UK Aims to Repay Chinese Victims of $7 Billion Bitcoin Fraud
contentSnippet: The debate continues over what to do with the seized $7 billion worth of Bitcoin: Should the U.K. keep it or give it back to the victims?

title: モブキャストHD、ソラナ投資に5億円を投じる計画　暗号資産事業への本格参入
contentSnippet: モブキャストHDは暗号資産事業への本格参入を決定し、ソラナ（SOL）購入に向け5億円を投資する計画を発表。ステーキング収益も視野に入れる。

title: MEXC、Ethenaに45億円追加投資へ
contentSnippet: MEXCは10月6日、TOKEN2049でEthenaに3,000万ドル（約45億円）の追加投資を発表。過去の投資と合わせて総額99億円のコミットメントとなる。戦略的パートナーとしてエコシステム全体で初期プロジェクトを支援する方針を明らかにした。
